thread.title: Saido Berahino ‘failed’ a drugs test at West Brom and was suspended by the FA before signing for Stoke
thread.title_full: Saido Berahino ‘failed’ a drugs test at West Brom and was suspended by the FA before signing for Stoke

author: sstreet
title: Saido Berahino ‘failed’ a drugs test at West Brom and was suspended by the FA before signing for Stoke
text:
EFL BERA DRUGS SHAME Saido Berahino ‘failed’ a drugs test at West Brom and was suspended by the FA before signing for Stoke 
Striker allegedly tested positive for a recreational drug and did not play for the Baggies between September 10 and his move to Bet365 Stadium By SAM STREET
